name: Hero Builder
description:
An evil witch took our hero love far in the dark jungle

Help him to save his love using your build powers!

Facing the evil witch traps and monsters!


Easy to play Hard to master Smooth Control Built in 10 days

Hero Builder is completely built solo in Gdevelop under 10 days for Gdevelop game
jam.

Compatible with PC & Mobile

Hero Builder is compatible with PC and Mobile
